tit.e: "Sunoko" (A Japanese Wooden Board Made of Slatted Thick Bars)
tit.cmt: タイトルなので、" "削除しました。説明訳括弧削除しました。

sen.j: すのこ（簀の子）は太い木の横板に薄い木の板を打ち付けたもの。
sen.e: "Sunoko" is a Japanese wooden board made of slatted thick bars.
"Sunoko" is a Japanese wooden board made of slatted thick bars.
"Sunoko" is a Japanese wooden board made of slatted thick bars.

sen.j: 滑り防止のため風呂場の床に敷いたり、梅雨時には収納物のカビ発生予防のため押入れの内部に入れて使われている。
sen.e: It is laid on the floor of a bathroom for preventing a person from slipping, and it is also used in "oshiire" (a built-in closet in a Japanese-style room) during the rainy season for preventing the goods in storage from molding.

It is laid on the floor of a bathroom for preventing a person from slipping, and it is also used in oshiire (a built-in closet in a Japanese-style room) during the rainy season for preventing the goods in storage from molding.

It is laid on the floor of a bathroom for preventing a person from slipping, and it is also used in oshiire (a built-in closet in a Japanese-style room) during the rainy season for preventing the goods in storage from molding.

sen.j: 最近は布団の下にすのこを敷いた「すのこベッド」も登場している。
sen.e: These days, "sunoko bed," which is "futon" [Japanese quilted bedding] laid on sunoko, is seen.
These days, sunoko bed, which is futon (Japanese quilted bedding) laid on sunoko, is seen.
sen.cmt: " "を削除しました。[を（に訂正しました。
sen.e: These days, sunoko bed, which is futon (Japanese quilted bedding) laid on sunoko, is seen.

sen.j: またパーソナルコンピュータやゲーム機等の冷却効率向上を目的とした、アルミニウム製のすのこなども存在する。
sen.e: There also exist other kinds of sunoko, including an aluminum version that is laid under a personal computer or a video game for promoting the cooling effect.
There also exist other kinds of sunoko, including an aluminum version that is laid under a personal computer or a video game for promoting the cooling effect.
There also exist other kinds of sunoko, including an aluminum version that is laid under a personal computer or a video game for promoting the cooling effect.

sen.j: 木は水気を吸い取るので、このようなすのこが湿気の多いところで重宝がられる。
sen.e: Wood absorbs moisture, so sunoko is convenient in humid places in Japan.
Wood absorbs moisture, so sunoko is convenient in humid places like Japan.
